item.title: Christine add a quote by Jenny Joseph
item.description: "But maybe I ought to practise a little now? So people who know me are not too shocked and surprised When suddenly I am old, and start to wear purple." -- Jenny Joseph

item.title: Christine add a quote by Sir William Osler
item.description: "Nothing in life is more wonderful than faith - the one great moving force which we can neither weigh in the balance nor test in the crucible." -- Sir William Osler

item.title: Christine add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The most beautiful experience we can have is the mysterious - the fundamental emotion which stands at the cradle of true art and true science." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Christine add a quote by William Wordsworth
item.description: "One Lesson, Shepherd, let us two divide, Taught both by what she shews, and what conceals, Never to blend our pleasure or our pride With sorrow of the meanest thing that feels." -- William Wordsworth
